title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-8.4 - Reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-8.4 - Reporting requirements

State Regulations

All insurance carriers and self-insured employers who
have contracted with a preferred provider organization for the treatment of
workers' compensation injuries and illnesses shall report to the chair the
names and addresses of insured employers who have elected to utilize the
preferred provider organization. As required by the chair, such carriers and
self-insured employers shall also report to the chair, in a prescribed format, specified data pertaining to utilization, quality of care, costs and
outcomes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-8.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
